content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Setup (around position 41, -82)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0) mining coal
- Input wooden chest at (41.5, -80.5) storing coal
- Output iron chests at (41.5, -83.5) and (41.5, -84.5) storing coal

### Iron Smelting System (around position 45-47, -81)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (45.0, -81.0) and (47.0, -81.0)
- Input wooden chest at (45.5, -79.5) containing iron ore
- Two burner inserters:
  - First inserter at (44.5, -79.5) facing RIGHT to feed first furnace
  - Second inserter at (46.5, -79.5) facing LEFT to feed second furnace
- Output wooden chest at (49.5, -80.5) storing iron plates
- Output burner inserter at (48.5, -80.5) moving plates from furnace to storage

Additional storage:
- Wooden chest at (45.5, -84.5)

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing inserters in occupied spaces
- Before placing inserters, verify the target position is clear of other entities
- Multiple attempts were made to place inserters at positions like (45.0, -80.0), (45.0, -79.5), (44.5, -80.5) which failed due to existing entities
- Plan inserter placement carefully considering the space needed for all components of the production line

# NAMESPACE

### Important Variables
- first_inserter: BurnerInserter - Inserter feeding the first furnace
- second_inserter: BurnerInserter - Inserter feeding the second furnace

### Entity States
- Coal mining drill: NO_FUEL status, output chest is full
- Furnaces: NO_INGREDIENTS status, have fuel but waiting for iron ore
- Inserters: WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS status, properly fueled with coal
